title: League of Legends won't open on a mac.
body: I use a Mac, which is currently running version 10.6.8. Every time I try to open League of Legends, it shows the logo for a few seconds, but then tells me that lol_launcher has quit unexpectedly. I've tried deleting the file, but it doesn't help. I have reinstalled League multiple times, and restarted my computer, but none of that has done anything. Also, I tried replacing my User Kernel, but it hasn't solved the problem. Every thread I've checked hasn't helped me so please help me fix it.

replies.body: Really, now I have to get 20$ so I can play, dammit

> Really, now I have to get 20$ so I can play, dammit

If you look in the App Store, you can update to 10.9 Mavericks for free. It takes about and hour or so but it's better than paying.

Hey Dyrus, we are no longer supporting 10.6.8

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=46513660

You can upgrade to 10.7 for $20
Same exact problem for me exept i hav a windows comp, check some previous threads and look for fists at far right cuz rioters hav posted there with help for macs
